practiceAreas: Auto Accidents|Spinal Cord Injuries|Traumatic Brain Injuries|Wrongful Death|Premise Liability
description:
Justice isn't about the size of a case, but the results. We know the physical, emotional, and financial toll that a personal injury can have on your life. At Cutter Law P.C., we are committed to advocating for people like you to obtain compensation for your losses. We accomplish this by providing comprehensive representation and personalized attention through every phase of your case.

Our law firm has secured hundreds of millions of dollars on behalf of clients in Folsom, Sacramento, Roseville and Placer County. We have worked on cases that include truck, car, SUV and other motor vehicle accidents; defective medical devices, metal-on-metal hip implants and product liability; medical malpractice; brain and spinal cord injuries; wrongful death; and whistleblower claims. We know how to use evidence and expert testimony to build a compelling argument that supports your lawsuit.

Our attorneys at Cutter Law P.C. have decades of combined experience, and we remain focused on your best interests. At our law firm, we believe in helping you make informed decisions that will target the maximum compensation possible under the law.
